pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Maps with R and Leaflet // Display spatial data with interactive maps powered by the open- source JavaScript library 'Leaflet' (see https://leafletjs.com/). Maps can be rendered in a web browser or displayed in the HTML viewer pane of 'RStudio'. This package is designed to be easy to use and can create complex maps with vector and raster data, web served map tiles and interface elements.
